EDMUND.raw_line: Wait, dad!If Dad were here, the war would be over, and we wouldn't have to goI know how to get on a trainPerhaps we've been incorrectly labeled?If home's still there.YES, Mom!Is it Latin for worst game ever invented?Get out! I was here first!Shhh, he's coming.That's the point! That's why he was seeking you!Well I believe you.Yah, didn't I tell you about the football field I found in the bathroom closet?Shut up! You think you're dad, but you're not!Lucy, Lucy. I hope you're not afraid of the darkLucy? Lucy! I think I believe you now!Lucy?He won't let go!I didn't know?Edmund, your majesty.I walked through a wardrobe following my sister.fourYes...your majesty. How did you do that?Could you make me taller?Turkish DelightThey're nothing specialReally?They're nothing specialOh, Peter will be king too?I-I guess I could bring 'em.Couldn't I have some more now?I hope so.The White Witch?Well what do you expect! It's freezing! How do we get out of here?I-I was just playing along. You know what little children are like these days, they just don't know when to stop pretendingOw!Ow!Can't we play hide and go seek again?Not like there's air insideAre you?You bowled it!Come on!Ow! Stop it!You didn't believe her either!Alright! I'm sorry.: Very funny.Can't we at lease take a look around?But that's a girl's coat!Besides, he's a criminal!It's a talking beaver!She's right. How do we know we can trust this beaver?Who's Aslan?I'm a Son of Adam, I met the Queen in the woods!Ye... yes, your majesty!NoWell I think so, but mom says...They just don't listen to me!I...I did bring them half way. There at the dam at the house of the beaver's!Is there any chance I may have some more Turkish delight now?Mr... Tumnus.I'm Edmund!I... I don't know!I don't know..Wait they said something about AslanI left before I could hear anymore...I wanted to see you again.Wait! The Beavers said something about the Stone Table and an army.NO!Hello...I'm feeling kinda tiredWhich is why we have to stay.I've seen what the White Witch can do and I've helped her do it, and we can't leave these people behind to suffer for it.Whoa horsey!Oh, sorryThen you'll have to lead us. There's a whole army out there waiting to follow you.Aslan believed you could. And so do I.FIRE!Peter's not King yet!You alright there Philip?Just catching my breathShe always running off

PETER.raw_line: Come on idiot Why do you always have to be so selfish! You only think about yourself. Why can't you ever do as you're told!If dad wasn't fighting and the war was over we wouldn't have to go.I will mumCome on, we've got to stay together now. Everything's going to be okayBye Mom, we'll miss youMrs. Macready?No, ma'am. It's just us.ED!Is it Latin?but we're already having so much fun!One...two...three...four...Eight four, eighty five...98, 99, 100... Ready or not here I come.You know, I'm not sure if you two have quite gotten the idea of this game!I don't think Lucy wants to play anymore.One game at a time Lu, we don't all have your imagination.Why don't you just stop it, you always have to make everything worse. Grow up!Susan's right. That's enough..Lucy, what are talking about?You saw the faun?We are very sorry sir, it won't happen again.We can handle it!The wardrobe upstairs, Lucy thinks she's found a forest inside.You're-you're not saying you believe her?You....you actually believe her?Edmund said they were only pretendingNo, this would be the first time.Peter winds up, goes for the bowl!Whoops! Wake up, Dolly Daydream!I thought you said that it was a kid's game.Are you ready then?Well done, Ed!Run!Go!I don't suppose saying we're sorry would quite cover it?You little liar!Apologize to Lucy.Say you're sorry!I think Lucy must decide!Well Mr. Tumnus it isWe can use these coats.Well I don't think the professor will mind. And if you think about it logically we are not even taking them out of the wardrobe.I know.LUCY!It's out of our hands now Lu.Maybe we should call the policeDon't worry Lucy, we'll think of somethingHere, boy *clicks* come here...*clicks*He say's he knows the faun.Yes. We were just talkingis there nothing we can do about Mr. Tumnus?Well we haven't actually been here very longAnd you think we're the ones???I think you've made a mistake; we're not heroes!I think it's time we were going.Sorry Lucy. It's out of our hands.Ed, time to go- Ed? I'm going to kill him.Hurry up!Get off me!We just can't let him go!So you knew this would happen?Then take us to him.Only if the Witch has toast.What do you suggest?We just want to get our brother back.It seems so farIf he tells me to Hurry up one more time I'm going to turn him into a big fluffy hatI'll go and have a lookDid you hear what he said... winter is almost over. You no what that means... no more ice!We don't have time.No, you're trying to be smart...as usual!Maybe you should.Mum's not here!!!Run!!!!!Hold onto me!We have come to see Aslan.That's why we are here.He's been captured by the White WitchIt is my fault really. I was too hard on him.No, that's just it...you're not who I think I amI don't think I will be able.Not all of them.Get some rest...and Edmund try not to wander off again.then you better pack some for the journeyYou are, I promised I'd keep you three safe but there's no reason I can't stay and help.Lucy it's too dangerous. You almost drowned, Edmund was almost killed!Where are you going?Come on Ed, sword hand up like Oreius showed us.Come and take it then.It is true, he's goneI can'tNo, but I bet they helpAre you with me?FOR NARNIA, AND FOR ASLAN!!!!Fall back! Draw them to the rocks!Stop!Ed! There are too many of them! Go! Get out of here! Get the girls, and get them home!Edmund!!When are you ever going to do are you're told?What is this?Not againThese aren't branches...You wouldn't believe us if we told you

LUCY.raw_line: The sheets feel scratchyWe could play hide-and-seekPlease, please, please.Were you hiding from me?if you don't mind my asking...what are you?I'm not a dwarf, I'm a girl! And actually I'm tallest in my class.Well, my mum's name is Helen...Of course.Well, I came in through the wardrobe in the spare room, and-Narnia? What's that?This is an awfully big wardrobeGlad to meet you, Mr. Tumnus! *extends hand* I'm Lucy Pevensie. Oh, you shake it!I-I don't know! People do it when they meet each other.Oh! Well, thank you very much! But I probably should be getting back...Well, maybe for just a little while... if you have... sardines.Can I help you with that?He had a nice face. You look just like him.My father is fighting in the war.Winter isn't all bad. There's ice skating and snow ball fights. Oh! And Christmas!No presents for a hundred years?yes please: No, I'm afraid I'm notOh I must goNo. You're the nicest faun I've ever met.I'm sure you're very sorry, and you'll never do it again.What are you doing?But I thought you were my friendI think so. Keep it, you need it more than I do.I'm back, I'm back, it's alright,but weren't you wondering where I was?But I wasn't imagining!You do?It was really there...Edmund? Oh Edmund!!!! I saw Mr. Tumnus again and he's fine!!! The White Witch hasn't found out about him helping me!She calls herself the Queen of Narnia, but she really isn't. Edmund? Are you okay? You look awful.Come on...this way.Peter, Peter wake up! It's there, it's really there!Narnia! It's all in the wardrobe, like I told you!No I wasn't, I saw Mr. Tumnus again! Oh, and this time - Edmund went too.Well, he didn't actually go there with me. What were you doing Edmund?Don't worry, it's probably just your imaginationNo, it wouldn't. But this might!That's alright, some little children just don't know when to stop pretending.I all want you to meet Mr. Tumnus!Who would do something like this?But we have to help him!You don't get it do you? I'm the human!!! He helped ME!It's a beaver.Yes?This is the handkerchief I gave to Mr-Is he alright?He means the trees.Oh, what a beautiful dam Mr. Beaver.waiting for us?But what about Mr. Tumnus?Edmund!Stop, this fighting isn't going to help EdmundThey're in the tunnel!are you all right?He is getting kinda bossyMaybe she's gone.AHHH!Merry Christmas, Sir!Presents!Well, I think I could be brave enough.Told you he was real!Oh no!PETER!!!!Has anyone seen my coat?Maybe they think you look funny.Sir, he's our brother.Maybe we had bring back a whole trunk load when we go home.Yes, before you go boring.EDMUND!Oh, EdmundNarnia isn't going to run out of toast Edmundbut they need us...All four of usSusan!We couldn't sleepWhy doesn't he fight back?We can't just leave him here.The TreesI'm so cold.Susan!We have to help them.Susan this is...When?No, but he's good...What did he say, Susan?Or a dream of a dream...Spare OomCome onWill we ever go back?
